analysis.key_quote: This rulemaking while on its surface appears to create accountability, it also has the very extreme side-effect that workers may be fired for opposing actions taken by an administration, re-creating the spoils system that existed in the past.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the potential loss of a merit-based system, indicating that it would undermine the integrity and quality of the civil service.
